p: NHP carcasses were collected in 279 municipalities located in 12 mesoregions of Minas Gerais state, covered by Cerrado and Atlantic Forest. YFV was detected in 159 municipalities (11 mesoregions) ( Fig 1B), within urban (n = 67), urban-rural interface (n = 20), and rural (n = 106) environments. In 2017 and 2018, the highest numbers of YFV-positive carcasses were from Metropolitan (42.6%), Zona da Mata (51.0%), and the South/Southwest (43.9%) regions ( S1 Table).
